timeline.message: Reduced method scope from public to protected for most of JsonSerializable APIs
Reduced method scope from public to protected for most of JsonSerializable APIs

timeline.bodyText:
why do we need these overridden methods?
the implementation is the same as parent class.
timeline.author: moderakh

timeline.bodyText: ditto, here and other places for the new methods, the implementation is the same as parent class why are they needed in every child class?
timeline.author: moderakh
moderakh

timeline.bodyText: (Could be out of scope of this PR) Potential double serialization. Instead of converting toJson and again back from Json, we could just use the propertybag to get UDF by using Resource(ObjectNode) overload.
timeline.author: mbhaskar

replies.bodyText: Will discuss offline on this one with you.

replies.bodyText: outside of scope of this PR. we can come back to this later. I fixed double serialization for point read item operation but not the udf, etc.
